verses.verse: And I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> and marvelous, <S%G2298><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> plagues; <S%G4127><s%> for in them is filled <S%G5055><s%> up the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> as it were a sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass <S%G5193><s%> mingled <S%G3396><s%> with fire: <S%G4442><s%> and them that had gotten the victory <S%G3528><s%> over <S%G1537><s%> the beast, <S%G2342><s%> and over <S%G1537><s%> his image, <S%G1504><s%> and over <S%G1537><s%> his mark, <S%G5480><s%> and over <S%G1537><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of his name, <S%G3686><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass, <S%G5193><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the harps <S%G2788><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And they sing <S%G103><s%> the song <S%G5603><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and the song <S%G5603><s%> of the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> and marvelous <S%G2298><s%> are your works, <S%G2041><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Almighty; <S%G3841><s%> just <S%G1342><s%> and true <S%G228><s%> are your ways, <S%G3598><s%> you King <S%G935><s%> of saints. <S%G40><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> shall not fear <S%G5399><s%> you, O Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and glorify <S%G1392><s%> your name? <S%G3686><s%> for you only <S%G3441><s%> are holy: <S%G3741><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> you; for your judgments <S%G1345><s%> are made <S%G5319><s%> manifest. <S%G5319><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> that I looked, <S%G1492><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> of the testimony <S%G3142><s%> in heaven <S%G3772><s%> was opened: <S%G455><s%>

And the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of the temple, <S%G3485><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues, <S%G4127><s%> clothed <S%G1746><s%> in pure <S%G2513><s%> and white <S%G2986><s%> linen, <S%G3043><s%> and having <S%G2192><s%> their breasts <S%G4738><s%> girded <S%G4024><s%> with golden <S%G5552><s%> girdles. <S%G2223><s%>

And one <S%G1520><s%> of the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> vials <S%G5357><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> lives <S%G2198><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>

And the temple <S%G3485><s%> was filled <S%G1072><s%> with smoke <S%G2586><s%> from the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and from his power; <S%G1411><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> was able <S%G1410><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple, <S%G3485><s%> till <S%G891><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> were fulfilled. <S%G5055><s%>
